sentences.en: A cat is chary of wetting its paws.
sentences.cn: 猫尽量避免弄湿它的脚掌.

sentences.en: He is chary of catching cold.
sentences.cn: 他很小心翼翼的不让自己感冒.

sentences.en: He is chary of giving praise.
He is chary of praise [ praising others ].
sentences.cn: 他吝于 [ 不轻易 ] 称赞别人.
他开口说话是很小心谨慎的.

sentences.en: Honesty, sober, chary and high sense of responsibility.
sentences.cn: 诚实 、 冷静 、 仔细及较高的责任心.

sentences.en: I am chary of making too many idiotic mistakes.
sentences.cn: 我小心谨慎以免犯太多的愚蠢错误。

sentences.en: I am rather chary of making too many idiotic mistakes.
sentences.cn: 我小心翼翼避免犯太多的愚蠢错误。

sentences.en: Mr. Gryce was of the small chary type , most inaccessible to impulses and emotions.
sentences.cn: 古莱先生是那种谨小慎微的人物,既无真挚的情感, 又无男性的冲动.

sentences.en: She is chary of lending money.
sentences.cn: 她对借出金钱很小心谨慎.

sentences.en: She started a chary descent of the stairs.
sentences.cn: 她开始小心翼翼地下楼梯.

sentences.en: She was chary of her reputation.
sentences.cn: 她十分注意自己的声誉.

sentences.en: The cat is chary of wetting its paws.
sentences.cn: 那猫小心翼翼的不弄湿它的爪子.

words.tran_cn: 谨慎的；仔细的；吝啬的；怕羞的

trans.tran_cn: 小心的，谨慎的，节省的，舍不得的
